casebody.data:
Garry Edward GRIM, Appellant/Petitioner(s),
v.
STATE of Florida, Appellee/Respondent(s). CASE NO.: 2D16-5141 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. October 11, 2018

BY ORDER OF THE COURT:

In light of the suggestion of death filed by counsel for the Appellant, this appeal is dismissed.

CRENSHAW, BLACK, and BADALAMENTI, JJ., Concur.
